items.title: Antibiotic Extraction from Wastewater
items.description: Lab-scale study developing protocols to detect and remove trace antibiotic residues from municipal wastewater using adsorption and filtration tests. Analysis included HPLC quantification and removal efficiency comparisons.

items.title: Sustainability Assessment of Solvent Recovery
items.description: Process simulation study evaluating energy and lifecycle impacts of solvent recovery units and proposing energy-saving retrofits.

items.title: Low-Cost Tree Watering Sensor
items.subtitle: Agricultural IoT for Bangladesh
items.description: A low-cost sensor that estimates soil moisture and tree water needs; designed for easy deployment and battery efficiency. Prototype uses off-the-shelf sensors and a simple thresholding model for irrigation alerts.
